docs.text: pitch black is a sheep in wolf's clothing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is full of darkness , danger and violence and if you buy into the marketing hype , an unsettling and scary film going experience .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: don't be fooled .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: pitch black is a morality play masquerading as a scare-fest .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it starts off with blistering intensity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a cargo spaceship crash lands on a planet apparently leeched of life by the scorching heat of three suns .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: among the survivors is fry ( mitchell ) , the ship's pilot , who spends the film wrestling with the fact that she tried to jettison the other passengers in her effort to land the craft safely .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is imam ( david ) , an islamic leader whose faith in his god is tested repeatedly throughout the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is a law enforcement officer in the form of johns ( hauser ) , who attacks every situation with square jawed authoritarian zeal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and there is riddick ( diesel ) , a menacing , muscle-bound convicted murderer who's being brought back to justice by johns .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the group quickly sizes up the situation and each other .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: confident in their assessment of matters , a plan is set in motion to escape their hellish environment .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: those plans are shredded by the appearance of one of the planet's wildlife , a predatory , sometimes winged , species that enjoys the taste of blood and flesh .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: fortunately , the creatures are light sensitive and are forced to live in networks of catacombs under the planet's surface .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: unfortunately , the group has managed to land on the planet moments before an eclipse is about to occur , taking away their one protection from the monsters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the group's savior comes in the form of johns , whose decisive leadership looks to deliver them from purgatory .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: or does it ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: pitch black deviates from the standard sci-fi fare by avoiding some of the stock " escape the boogieman " conflicts the genre typically serves up .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: just as the planet gave a false facade of lifelessness , first appearances given by the survivors proves to be just as false .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the excitement of the film comes not from the danger posed by the creatures , but rather from watching the shifting allegiances and emotional growth of the characters as the planet serves as a deus ex machina of sorts to catalyze emotional growth .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a recurrent theme runs throughout the movie of faith , whether it be religious or in a person , and how that powers their motivations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i found it telling that an accidental death occurs early on due to the misperception of a self professed atheist .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: conversely , imam constantly contributes any good fortune to allah .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one by one , his perceived heaven sent blessings are taken away and crushed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: imam is forced to reassess his faith .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: another character expresses belief in god , along with a life long hate .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet another character makes a decision that echoes the sentiments of christ about selflessness and has lasting repercussions for several of group .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is a fascinating character study hiding under the guise of a scare flick .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: special mention should be made of vin diesel , who intriguingly conveys feral menace combined with a truly mesmerizing presence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his character could have easily slipped into a parody of the baddass killing machine , but twohy and diesel add surprising depth to riddick .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they can be excused for the two or three shwarzenegger-like catch phrases that growl their way out of diesel's mouth .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie has its flaws that can be nitpicked .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the creatures do look derivative of the ones in alien .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dialogue isn't the freshest at times , reminiscent of a bad comic book .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yes , the appearance of riddick's vision skills are more than a little timely considering the situation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: these trappings are on the periphery of the story twohy is really trying to tell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: twohy may have lured you in under the pretense of scaring you with film fabricated boogieman , but he shows the real boogieman to be the prejudices and beliefs we use to direct decisions in our lives .
docs.label: positive
